SageTVPlugin.Name: Select and Batch Delete
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Select and Batch Delete for SageTV 7. Save keystrokes when you have many files to delete.
Press "DVD Return" or "DVD Menu" on your Sage remote or Ctrl-m on your keyboard to select a file (or group of files) for deletion.
Bring up the options menu to delete the selected files.
